pages.title: Ammo Cartridge
pages.text: Carry more rounds with the ammo cartridge! Right-click whilst holding it to open a chest-like UI.$(br)Any round on the ground that is picked up will be put into a cartridge.$(br)$(italic)A cartridge can only hold one type of ammo! Once you put crossbow bolts in it, it'll not accept bullets anymore until it is empty.$()

pages.flavor_text: *slaps cartridge* This boy can fit so many rounds in it
